alert.note: Alert for Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 29 at 8:27PM CDT until May 04 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Roseau River at Roseau affecting Roseau County. .Water levels have dropped, but from recent rains across the area levels will rise again into Minor Flood Stage Sunday and cresting sometime Sunday night into Monday. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Roseau River at Roseau. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 13.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Sunday morning to a crest of 16.4 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
